Dialog.Title: Maemotes

CloseDialogWindow.Hint: Configure whether or not the dialog window will be closed after sending an emote.
CloseDialogWindow.Name: Close Dialog Window

EnableChatBubbles.Hint: Configure whether or not chat bubbles will be displayed above Tokens for emote type chat messages.
EnableChatBubbles.Name: Enable Chat Bubbles

ChatBubblesDuration.Hint: Determine the length of time in seconds for which to display an emote chat bubble.
ChatBubblesDuration.Name: Chat Bubbles Duration

DisplayDefaultEmotes.Hint: Configure whether or not default emotes will be displayed in the dialog window.
DisplayDefaultEmotes.Name: Display Default Emotes

DisplayCustomEmotes.Hint: Configure whether or not custom emotes will be displayed in the dialog window.
DisplayCustomEmotes.Name: Display Custom Emotes

CustomEmote#.Hint: It is recommended to upload your images to the "custom" folder located in "modules/maemotes/artwork", e.g. "modules/maemotes/artwork/custom/emote.png".
CustomEmote#.Name: Custom Emote #
